data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Eastern Cape, South Africa.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Eastern Cape, South Africa
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Eastern Cape, South Africa today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Eastern Cape, South Africa.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 6,490,700 people living in Eastern Cape, South Africa. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Eastern Cape, South Africa who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, provide a Bible for every believer in Eastern Cape, South Africa, and teach them to obey it.
data.verse: For if you listen to the word and don’t obey, it is like glancing at your face in a mirror. 24 you see yourself, walk away, and forget what you look like. 25 But if you look carefully into the perfect law that sets you free, and if you do what it says and don’t forget what you heard, then God will bless you for doing it.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Eastern Cape.

data.section_summary:
the state of Eastern Cape, South Africa has a population of 6,490,700.

We estimate Eastern Cape has 1,364,371 people who might know Jesus, 3,637,200 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,489,129 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Eastern Cape
location.cities_list: Port Elizabeth, East London, Uitenhage, Bhisho, Queenstown
location.cities_list_w_pop: Port Elizabeth (967,677), East London (478,676), Uitenhage (228,912), Bhisho (137,287), Queenstown (105,309)
